=== Download ===

There is no official releases at the moment. We recommend to use [[https://svn.sendanor.fi/svn/openjs/trunk/|the subversion repository]].

=== Subversion ===

Check out latest development source code:

 svn checkout https://svn.sendanor.fi/svn/openjs/trunk openjs
